content: Hi I would like to know if how successful any of you have been locating old friends. I have been looking for quite sometimes for a few friends and was wondering if anyone could give me any good pointers and tactics to do so. It been over 20yrs I see the names listed here in the database but no email or anyway to get in touch. PLEASE HELP

title: locating air force and navy friends from the 80's-90's

content: buddy finder might be helpful but I've noted it only gives the name..... no way to contact. I did have some luck several years ago by googling my old VN outfit... the options led me to a site and lo-and-behold I saw a picture of me.. from there I contacted the person managing the site which lead to contacts.... it was fun at first but in hindsight I think it better if I had just left well enough alone. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: Go here: Missins Persons and post the names, units and dates for the buddies that you are looking. We wish you success in your search. Please keep us posted. Bruce God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. content: Sometimes if you google the name of the unit, ship, air base ect. It will pop up, I found my ship and some of my buddies from the Navy by googling the name of the ship! Good luck! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!
